title: Playmobil City Zoo
description:
Amazon offers Prime members the Playmobil City Zoo for $14.39 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $4. This 91-piece set includes several figures.

Note: It's temporarily out of stock but still available to purchase for this price. (It's expected to be back in stock on January 4.)

title: Yeti Roadie 20 Cooler
description: As one of its daily deals, Woot offers the Yeti Roadie 20 Cooler in Ice Blue for $139.99 plus $5 for shipping. That's the lowest outright price we've seen and the best deal we could find now by $55. (For further comparison, we saw it bundled with a $75 Academy Sports gift card for $200 three weeks ago.) It features a ColdLock gasket, lid latches, tie-down slots, and Vortex drain system. Deal ends today.

title: Go Pet Club 47" Kitten Tree
description: Amazon offers the Go Pet Club 47" Kitten Tree for $29.99. Clip the 10% off coupon to cut that to $26.99. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $8. It measures 29" x 23" x 46.75"and is covered in faux fur.

title: Precious Moments Kermit Porcelain Figurine
description: Amazon offers Prime members the Precious Moments Disney The Muppets Music Is What Friendship Sounds Like Porcelain Kermit Figurine for $28.06 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $22. It measures approximately 4.5".

title: Mega Construx Despicable Me Waterski Set
description:
With orders of $25 or more, Amazon offers the Mega Construx Despicable Me Wild Waterski Bike Building Set for $4.20. That's the lowest price we could find by $15. It features three buildable Minion figures with "water splash" details and interchangeable parts, including overalls, goggles, arms, and feet.

Note: This item is part of Amazon's "add-on" program and can only be purchased with an order of $25 or more.

title: Fred & Friends Taco Truck Taco Holder 2-Pack
description: L & P Leading Trend via Amazon offers Prime members the Fred & Friends Taco Truck Taco Holder 2-Pack for $7.72 with free shipping for Prime members. That's the lowest total price we could find by $8. It includes one salsa red truck and one guacamole green truck.

title: Fred & Friends Deep Tea Diver Tea Infuser
description: L & P Leading Trend via Amazon offers Prime members the Fred & Friends Deep Tea Diver Silicone Tea Infuser for $8.25 with free shipping for Prime members. That's the lowest total price we could find by $8. It's dishwasher- and microwave-safe and features a stainless steel "air tank" serves as a counterweight for the infuser.

title: Rubbermaid Folding Laundry Hamper
description: Amazon offers Prime members the Rubbermaid Folding Laundry Hamper in Natural for $9.08 with free shipping. (Home Depot charges the same with in-store pickup.) That's $2 under our June mention and the lowest price we've seen. (It's a current low by $5.) It's made of canvas and measures 23" x 14" x 14".

title: KitchenAid 5-Quart Stand Mixer
description: Amazon offers the KitchenAid 5-Quart Stand Mixer in Cavair for $174.99 with free shipping. That's $30 under our May mention and the lowest price we could find now by $65. It features a beater, dough hook, pouring shield, stainless steel bowl, and a wire whip.

title: Marriott Rewards® Premier Credit Card
APC UPS Connect 84VA Battery Back-Up System
description: Amazon offers the APC UPS Connect 84VA Battery Back-Up System for $44.05. Clip the $13 off coupon to cut that to $31.05. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $40, although it was a buck less three weeks ago. It features over two hours of network backup power, two surge-protected outlets, a removable battery pack for smartphone charging, and three USB ports.

title: L.L.Bean Girls' Puff-n-Stuff Jacket
description: L.L.Bean offers its L.L.Bean Boys' Puff-n-Stuff Jacket in three colors (Bold Lilac pictured) for $29.99. Coupon code "EXTRA25" cuts that price to $37.49. With free shipping, that's $37 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes 10/12 and 14/16. Deal ends January 1.

title: Mainstays Recliner
description: Walmart offers the Mainstays Recliner in three colors (Grey Fabric pictured) for $159 with free shipping. That's $40 off and a great deal for a recliner. It features pocketed comfort coils and fingertip actuated recline control.

title: Insulated 16oz. Thermos w/ Tea Strainer
description: EFO-S via Amazon offers its EFOSHM Insulated Stainless Steel 16-oz. Thermos with Removable Tea Strainer in Black for $16.99. Clip the 40% off coupon to drop the price to $10.19. Plus, Prime members receive free shipping. That's $7 under our January mention and the lowest price we've seen. This double-wall, vacuum-insulated thermos is BPA-free.

title: Mass Effect: Andromeda Deluxe for Xbox One
description: Newegg offers the Mass Effect: Andromeda Deluxe for Xbox One for $19.99. Coupon code "EMCBCDR39" cuts the price to $9.99. With $2.99 for shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $10, although it was a a buck less two weeks ago.

title: Staples Bresser Luxura Managers Chair
description: Staples offers its Staples Bresser Luxura Managers Chair in Tan for $67.86 with free shipping. That's $81 off and the lowest price we could find. It's weight-rated to 225-lbs. and features pneumatic seat height adjustment, internal lumbar support, and adjustable tilt tension and lock.

title: Mainstays Adjustable-Height Barstool 3pk
description: Walmart offers the Mainstays Adjustable-Height Swivel Barstool 3-Pack for $50 with free shipping. That's $49 off and the lowest price we could find. They are adjustable from 24" to 29".

title: SeatWell Ergonomic Task Chair
description: Sam's Club offers its members the SeatWell Ergonomic Task Chair in several colors (White pictured) for $39.98 with free shipping. (Non-members pay a $3.99 surcharge.) That's $10 off and the lowest price we could find. It has a weight capacity of up to 300 lbs.

title: "The Ripple Trilogy" Kindle eBook Box Set
description: Amazon offers Cidney Swanson's The Ripple Trilogy: Books 1-3 for Kindle for free. (Barnes & Noble and Kobo charge the same.) That's $8 off and the lowest price we could find.

title: DIRECTV + AT&T Internet, $300 in Reward Cards
description: With a 2-year TV and a 1-year Internet agreement, AT&T offers its AT&T Internet 50 service bundled with DIRECTV Select and a $300 in Reward Cards for $65 per month for the first 12 months. (Scroll down. It's the offer on the right under "Bundle AT&T services and save".) The Internet 50 service features speeds up to 50Mbps with unlimited data. DIRECTV Select features over 150 channels, HD DVR service, plus HBO, SHOWTIME, STARZ, and Cinemax for three months. (Plan prices may vary by location. The cost for months 13-24 is $106/mo.)

title: Britax Marathon ClickTight Car Seat
description:
Amazon offers the Britax Marathon ClickTight Convertible Car Seat in Prescott for $219.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $53. It features an adjustable height and harness, reclining seat, side impact protection, and support for kids up to 65 lbs.

It's expected to ship in 1 to 2 months.

title: Canon Pixma WiFi Inkjet Printer w/ Paper
description: BuyDig offers the Canon Pixma Pro-100 Wireless Professional Inkjet Photo Printer bundled with the Canon Photo Paper Plus Semi-Gloss SG201 13x19" 50-Sheet Pack for $329. Redeem this $250 mail-in rebate to cut the price to $79. With free shipping, that's tied with our expired mention from three days ago, and the lowest price we could find by $171. The printer features a 4800x2400 dpi maximum print resolution, up to 13x19" wide-format printing, 802.11n wireless, PictBridge, and USB. Deal ends December 31.

title: Columbia Women's Karis Gale Long Jacket
description: Columbia offers the Columbia Women's Karis Gale Long Jacket in several colors (Dark Raspberry pictured) for $99.99. Coupon code "COLDEC60" knocks it to $79.99. Plus, Greater Rewards members receive free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to sign up.) That's $120 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in select sizes from XS to XL. Deal ends December 31.

title: Ugg Closet Sale
description: Ugg Closet takes up to 60% off select men's, women's, and kids' footwear during its Closet Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Shipping adds $8, but orders of $125 or more bag free shipping. Available sizes and quantities for some items are limited.

title: 2 Men's Leather Double Prong Belts
description: Dailysteals via eBay offers two Men's Leather Double Prong Belts in Black and Brown for $7.99 with free shipping. That's $3 below our August mention and the lowest price we could find by $5. They're available in sizes 30-32 to 42-44.

title: AKG K553 Pro Studio Headphones
description: Musician's Friend offers the AKG K553 Pro Closed-Back Studio Headphones for $99 with free shipping. That's a buck under our July mention and $51 below the lowest we could find for a used pair. (These are new. Other stores charge around $199 for a new pair.) These closed-back headphones feature 50mm drivers, a frequency response of 12Hz to 28kHz, 32-ohm impedance, foam ear pads, and 10-foot straight cable.

title: Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood for PC
description:
Amazon offers Prime members Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood for Windows for $11.77 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $28.

Note: You must have Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn (sold separately) to play Stormblood.

title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Face Wash 3-Pack
description:
Amazon offers the Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Face Wash 9.1-oz. Bottle 3-Pack for $12.75. Check out via Subsribe & Save to cut that price to $12.11 and bag free shipping. That's $7 under what you'd pay at a local retailer.

Note: Be sure to cancel your subscription once your order ships to avoid being billed for further shipments.

title: inFAMOUS Second Son for PS4
description: Amazon offers downloads of inFAMOUS Second Son for PlayStation 4 for $9.99. (PlayStation Store has it for the same price.) That's $10 under the best deal we could find for a physical copy.

title: Barclaycard Arrival Plus™ MasterCard®
11mm AA+ Freshwater Lavender Pearl Necklace
description: Win Pearl offers this 11mm AA+ Freshwater Lavender Pearl Necklace for $99.99. Coupon code "dealnews60" cuts that to $40. With free shipping, that's $130 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features a silver clasp and measures 17.5" in length. Deal ends January 4.

title: MSI X370 Gaming Plus AMD AM4 ATX Mobo
description:
Amazon offers the MSI X370 Gaming Plus AMD Ryzen AM4 ATX Motherboard for $109.99. This $30 mail-in rebate cuts it to $79.99. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $49, outside of the deal below. It supports AMD Ryzen CPUs and 7th Generation A-series/Athlon CPUs. Other features include two PCIe 3.0 x16 slots, one PCIe 2.0 x16 slot, six SATA 6Gb/s ports, one HDMI port, and Gigabit Ethernet. Deal ends December 31.

Newegg charges the same, also after rebate, but with 99 cents for shipping.

title: Kindle Unlimited 12-Month Subscription
description: Amazon offers a Kindle Unlimited 12-Month Subscription for $83.92. That's $36 off, and a monthly rate of $7. Kindle Unlimited features unlimited reading and listening for hundreds of thousands of Kindle books and audiobooks. Some conditions apply.

title: 6 Folgers Ground Coffee 10.3-oz. Cans
description: ShopRite offers six Folgers Ground Coffee 10.3-oz. Canisters in Colombian (pictured), French Roast, Black Silk, or Breakfast Blend for $11.94. Coupon code "SHIPSFREE" yields free shipping. That's $1.99 per can and $13 under the lowest price we could find for any flavor in this quantity from another local store.

title: Express Clearance Sale
description: Express takes an extra 50% off its men's and women's clearance items. (Discount is applied automatically in-cart.) Shipping adds $8, but orders of $25 or more qualify for free shipping. Some exclusions apply. Deal ends December 31.

title: Pflueger President/Cabela's Spinning Combo
description: Cabela's offers the Pflueger President/Cabela's Tourney Trail Spinning Combo for $49.88. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $8.95 shipping fee. That's $40 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features a nine-bearing reel with anti-reverse, multidisc drag system, IM8-graphite rod, and split cork grips. It's available in 6.5-foot to 7-foot lengths with fast or moderate fast action.

title: Cooler Master MasterBox Lite 3.1 TG mATX Case
description: Newegg offers the Cooler Master MasterBox Lite 3.1 TG MicroATX Mini Tower Case in Black for $39.99. This $10 mail-in rebate cuts it to $29.99. With $3.99 for shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $6. It features two internal 3.5" drive bays, an internal 2.5" drive bay, USB 3.0, one 120mm fan (with support for up to two more), four expansion slots, and 4mm tempered glass side panel. It comes with three custom trim colors. Deal ends December 31.

title: Razor Jetts Heel Wheels
description: Amazon offers Prime members the Razor Jetts Heel Wheels for $21.99 with free shipping. (Target charges the same with in-store pickup.) That's the lowest price we could find by $3. They fit shoe sizes from kids' 12 through men's 12.

title: Gunnar Optiks Intercept Computer Glasses
description: For Prime members only, Amazon offers the Gunnar Optiks Intercept Computer Gaming Glasses in Onyx for $39.99. In-cart, clip the "up to 20% off" coupon to knock it to $31.99. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $8; beyond that, many stores charge around $70. These glasses claim to reduce eye strain and block 65% of blue light emitted from electronic devices.

title: Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card
"Art of Blizzard Entertainment" in Hardcover
description: Barnes & Noble offers Nick Carpenter's The Art of Blizzard Entertainment Hardcover Book for $9.99 plus $4.99 for shipping. That's $10 off and the lowest price we could find. (Third-party vendors charge significantly more, as this title is presumably no longer in print.)

title: Pinhole Nanny WiFi DVR Cam
description: Etopmarket via eBay offers the Pinhole Nanny WiFi DVR Cam for $16.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we could find now for such a camera by $5, excluding other eBay vendors. It features automatic video recording and a built-in rechargeable battery.

title: Exploding Kittens: A Card Game (NSFW Edition)
description: Exploding Kittens via Amazon offers Prime members Exploding Kittens: A Card Game (NSFW Edition) for $15.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our Black Friday week mention and the lowest price we could find by $3. This edition of the cult game includes 56 cards and accommodates two to five players.

title: 180-Degree Full Face Snorkel Mask
description: ZSport via Amazon offers this ZSport 180° Full Face Snorkel Mask in several colors (Black pictured) with prices starting from $19.99. Coupon code " KZA9HVXZ" cuts that to $15. Plus, Prime members receive free shipping. That's tied with our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $3.) It's available in sizes S/M or L/XL. Deal ends December 31.

title: Used Alien: Covenant on Blu-ray
description:
With stock varying by ZIP code, Redbox offers used copies of Alien: Covenant on Blu-ray for $3.99 at participating locations. That's $13 under the best deal we could find for a sealed copy.

You can also get it as a used DVD for $4.99.

title: Used Star Wars: Rogue One on Blu-ray
description:
With stock varying by ZIP code, Redbox offers used copies of Star Wars: Rogue One on Blu-ray for $3.99 at participating locations. That's $16 under our March mention and the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $19.)

Note that the copy you receive likely won't include the DVD and digital code a factory-sealed Blu-ray edition would.

title: Stanley Hand Tools 8" Linesman's Pliers
description: Walmart offers the Stanley Hand Tools 8" Linesman's Pliers for $4.98. Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping charge. That's the lowest price we could find by about a buck, although several stores charge at least $10. They feature double-dipped handles.

title: Winter Styles at Columbia
description:
Columbia takes 60% off a selection of winter styles via coupon code "COLDEC60". Plus, Greater Rewards members receive free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to sign up.) That's tied as the best percent-off coupon we've seen this year. Deal ends December 31.

See all Columbia Coupons.

title: Jos. A. Bank Lowest Prices of the Year Event
description:
Jos. A. Bank takes up to 85% off sitewide during its Lowest Prices of the Year Event. (Prices are as marked.) Plus, all orders receive free shipping. Sale ends January 1. A couple of best bets:
  • Jos. A. Bank Men's Traveler Merino Wool Polo Sweater for $23.99 ($86 off)
  • Jos. A. Bank Men's Signature Tailored Fit Check Sportcoat for $79.20 (pictured, $419 off)

title: Bank of America® Cash Rewards Credit Card
Jos. A. Bank Men's Executive Corduroy Pants
description: Jos. A. Bank offers its Jos. A. Bank Men's Executive Flat-Front Corduroy Pants in Tan or Brown for $19.99. Plus, Bank Account Rewards members get free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's tied with last week's mention, $80 off list, and the lowest price we could find. They're available in select sizes from 30x30" to 42x32.

title: Loot Crate LootVault Sale
description: Loot Crate takes 70% off its Loot Vault items. Plus, coupon code "MAG25" cuts an extra 25% off. That beats their Cyber Monday sale, which lacked the extra discount, and is the best discount we've seen on Loot Vault items. Shipping adds $5, but orders of $50 or more qualify for free shipping.

title: Olaxer Professional Hair Straightener
description: SkySeaCloud via Amazon offers the Olaxer Professional Wide Flat-Iron Hair Straightener for $27.99. Coupon code "4F28R8O3" cuts that to $19.99. With free shipping, that's tied with our mention from three weeks ago, $15 off list, and the lowest price we could find. It features 11 temperature settings (from 265°F to 450°F), a 1.7" ceramic plate, and auto-shut off. Deal ends December 31.

title: Women's Beauty Sample Box, $8 Amazon Credit
description:
Exclusively for Prime members, Amazon offers the Women's Daily Beauty Sample Box bundled with an $7.99 Amazon Credit for $7.99 with free shipping. (The credit must be used towards purchases of similar beauty products.) Assuming you'll use the credit, that ties last week's mention and makes the sample box essentially free. Each box includes 10 or more beauty items. It's limited to one box per customer.

Note: This item ships in one to two weeks.

title: Purina Cat Food Sample Box w/ $7 Amazon GC
description:
Exclusively for Prime members, Amazon offers the Purina Cat Food Sample Box bundled with a $6.99 Amazon Credit for $6.99 with free shipping. (The credit must be used towards purchases of select Purina cat products.) That's tied with our mention from three weeks ago, and assuming you'll use the credit, makes the sample box essentially free. Each box contains six or more samples of dry and wet cat food.

Note: It's expected to ship in one to two weeks.

title: Amazon Echo Dot
description: Amazon offers the second-generation Amazon Echo Dot in Black for $29.99 with free shipping. (Best Buy, Bed Bath & Beyond, and Newegg all have it for the same price.) That's tied with our mention from three weeks ago as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $5.) It features Alexa voice control, 802.11n dual-band wireless, Bluetooth, and a 3.5mm audio output.

title: Outdoor Theatre Total Home FX Kit
description: Home Depot offers the Outdoor Theatre Total Home FX Kit for $149.75 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $193. The kit includes a 96" screen, 24-watt speaker, and projector with Bluetooth and one HDMI port.

title: Dick's Sporting Goods Clearance Sale
description:
Dick's Sporting Goods cuts an extra 25% to 40% off select clearance items, already marked up to 60% off. (Discount applies in-cart; alas, not all marked items are eligible.) Shipping adds $5.99, but orders of $25 or more bag free shipping. A couple of best bets, with prices after all discounts and $5.99 for shipping:
  • Reebok Women's T-Back Tank Top for $5.98 ($19 off)
  • adidas Men's Phenom Embossed Tech 3/4-Sleeve Shirt for $14.38 ($16 off)

title: Bacon-Opoly Game
description: Walmart offers the Bacon-Opoly Game for $17.28. (Amazon charges the same with free shipping for Prime members.) Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping fee. That's the lowest price we could find by $3, although we saw it for a buck less in September. It features play for two to six people.

title: Wells Fargo Cash Wise Visa® Card
Philips Norelco Multigroom 5000 Trimmer
description: Walmart offers the Philips Norelco Multigroom Series 5000 Trimmer for $20. (Amazon charges the same.) Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping charge. That's tied with our mention from last week as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal we could find now by $7.) The set includes 18 pieces.

title: Christmas Items at Home Depot
description:
Home Depot takes 50% to 75% off a selection of Christmas trees, lighting, and decor. Choose ship-to-store pickup to dodge shipping fees, which start at $5.99, or bag free shipping on orders of $45 or more. (Certain items qualify for no-minimum free shipping.) A couple of best bets:
  • LightShow Holiday Projection RGB Ribbon Light 2-Pack for $4.97 ($15 off)
  • Martha Stewart Living 7.5-ft. Indoor Snowy Norwegian Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Clear Lights for $249.50 (pictured, $250 off)

title: Rain-X Latitude Wiper Blades at Amazon
description:
At Amazon, buy any two Rain-X wiper blades, and get $5 off a future purchase at Amazon. (After your order ships you'll receive a code for $5 off a future purchase.) Plus, Prime members receive free shipping on all orders. Deal ends January 1. Some best bets, before discount:
  • Rain-X Water 26" Repellency 2-in-1 Wiper Blade for $14.97 (pictured)
  • Rain-X 17" Latitude Wiper Blade for $14.97

title: Breville Nespresso Creatista Plus
description: Amazon offers the Breville Nespresso Creatista Plus Espresso and Coffee Maker for $329.95 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $89. It features auto-frothing with eight texture levels and 11 milk temperature settings, multiple beverage selections, an LCD display, 1.5-liter water tank, and 19 bars of pressure.

title: Aeropostale End of Season Clearance Sale
description:
Aeropostale takes 70% to 80% off all clearance items as part of its End of Season Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Shipping adds $5, but orders of $75 or more qualify for free shipping.

Note: Select items may be less at Aeropostale via eBay, which has no-minimum free shipping.

title: Energizer Automatic LED Nightlights 2-Pack
description: 13 Deals offers the Energizer Automatic Slim LED Nightlights 2-Pack for $6.46. Coupon code "ENERGIZER1218" cuts the price to $3.49. With free shipping, that's tied with our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we could find by $10. They are sensor activated and measure 4.5" x 2" x 1.5".

title: Armani Exchange Semi-Annual Sale
description: Armani Exchange takes 50% off men's, women's, and kids' items as part of its Semi-Annual Sale. (Prices are as marked.) Shipping adds $7.50, or spend $100 or more for free shipping.

title: Jos. A. Bank Men's 1905 Cotton Stripe Sweater
description: Jo.s A. Bank offers its Jos. A. Bank Men's 1905 Collection Cotton Stripe Sweater in Navy or Cream for $23.99. Plus, Bank Account Rewards members get free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's tied with last week's mention at $76 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in select sizes from S to XL.

title: Husky 10- and 11-Piece Drive Socket Sets
description:
Home Depot discounts a selection of Husky 10- and 11-piece drive socket sets to $6.88 with free shipping, as listed below. Each is $3 off list and the lowest price we could find. The sets:
  • Husky 11-Piece 1/4" Metric Drive Socket and Ratchet Set for $6.88 (pictured)
  • Husky 11-Piece 1/4" SAE Drive Socket Set for $6.88
  • Husky 10-Piece 3/8" Metric Drive Socket Set for $6.88
  • Husky 10-Piece 3/8" SAE Drive Socket Set for $6.88

title: Bank of America® Travel Rewards Credit Card
Citybug 2 Electric Scooter with Lights
description: Jet.com offers the Brookstone Citybug 2 Electric Scooter with Lights in Black for $199.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from last week and the lowest price we could find now by $100. It features a push and pull acceleration system, headlight, and tail light.

title: Jos. A. Bank Men's Classic Tailored Fit Suit
description: Jos. A. Bank offers its Jos. A. Bank Men's Classic Collection Tailored Fit Suit in Grey or Charcoal for $55.20 with free shipping. That's tied with last week's mention, $145 off list, and a low price for a men's suit in general. It's available in select regular and long sizes from 37 38 to 41. Deal ends January 1.

title: Refurb MacBook Air Broadwell i5 12" Laptop
description:
Altatac via eBay offers the refurbished Apple MacBook Air Broadwell Core i5 1.6GHz 11.6" Laptop for $549.95 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from two weeks ago as the lowest price we've seen. (It's $185 under the best deal for a new unit.) It features an Intel Core i5 1.6GHz Broadwell dual-core processor, 11.6" 1366x768 LCD, 4GB RAM, 128GB flash storage, webcam, 802.11ac wireless, Bluetooth 4.0, USB 3.0, Thunderbolt, and Mac OS X 10.10 Yosemite.

Note: A 90-day warranty applies, although it's unclear who backs it.

title: Microsoft Store Countdown to 2018 Game Sale
description:
For Xbox Live Gold members only, Microsoft Store takes up to 65% off a selection of game downloads for Xbox One furing its Countdown to 2018 Sale. (Not a member? Sign up for a month for just $1.) Deal ends January 4. A couple of best bets:
  • Deux Ex: Mankind Divided for Xbox One for $9 (low by $4)
  • For Honor: Standard Edition for Xbox One for $19.80 (pictured, low by $10)

title: Theefun 1:16 Rock Crawler 2.4Ghz RC Car
description: SkySeaCloud via Amazon offers the Theefun 1:16 Rock Crawler 2.4Ghz Remote Control Car for $59.99. Coupon code "264L7LDQ" cuts that to $35.99. With free shipping, that's $24 off and the lowest price we could find. It features anti-skid wheels, shockproof suspension, 4WD, and rechargeable battery. One AA battery is required. Deal ends December 31.

title: Elechomes Big Mouth 900W Juicer
description: SkySeaCloud via Amazon offers the Elechomes Big Mouth 900-watt Juicer for $79.99. Coupon code "BM5SK2CF" cuts it to $54.99. With free shipping, that's $5 under last week's mention, $25 off list, and the lowest price we've seen. It features a 900-watt motor, 3" chute, juice container which doubles as a serving pitcher, and overheat protection. Deal ends January 5.

title: Syma X56W Camera Quadcopter Drone
description: RC Drone via Amazon offers the Syma X56W Camera Quadcopter Drone in Black or White for $59.90. Coupon code "T2FIL4OI" cuts the price to $39.53. With free shipping, that's $2 under our mention from a week ago and the lowest price we could find now by $10. It features 6-axis stability, has a flight time of seven minutes, and can be controlled with the remote or with a smartphone. Deal ends December 31.

title: Cooking Kindle eBooks
description: Amazon offers a selection of cooking Kindle eBooks for free. Each is at least a buck off list and the lowest price we could find. Discounted titles include Five Ingredient Cookbook: Easy Recipes in 5 Ingredients or Less (pictured), BBQ Party: 50 Essential Smoking Meat Recipes, and Cast Iron Cookbook: Ultimate Cast Iron Cooking Recipes.

title: Ryobi 18V High Power Volume Inflator
description: Home Depot offers the Ryobi 18-volt High Power Volume Inflator for $19.97. Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. That's tied with last month's mention and the lowest price we could find by $14. It can inflate a standard twin air mattress in 45 seconds.

title: Southwest Rapid Rewards® Plus Credit Card
Accent Furniture at Macy's
description:
Macy's cuts up to 70% off a selection of accent furniture with prices starting at $66.20. Shipping starts around $10.95 and surcharges may apply. Discounted items include chairs, side tables, chaise lounges, and loveseats. A couple best bets:
  • Ander Accent Chair for $89 + $11 s&h ($50 off)
  • Coryn Fabric Accent Chair for $159 + $26 s&h (pictured, $166 off)

title: 5 Deals You Need to Know Today: A Record-Low Price for an Amazon Tap
description: Today you can get a refurbished, Amazon-warrantied Tap at an all-time low price, or sink into Bethesda's BioShock-beater Prey, also at its cheapest price yet. Check out these offers and more in our roundup of the top five Editors' Choice deals we found last night and this morning.

title: VIDEO: Our Champagne Taste Test Finds the Best Bubbles for Your Buck!
description: Nothing says "Happy new year" like the popping of a cork, but are there any sparkling wines that are good and a good price? Find out in our video taste test!

title: 9 Ways to Eat Healthy on a Budget in 2018
description: Want to eat healthier and save more money in the new year? Contrary to popular belief, those two things aren't mutually exclusive. We rounded up a few tips to help you get started on your 2018 resolutions.

title: 7 New Year's Resolutions That Will Save You Money
description: Most sites will tell you to quit smoking or stop buying Starbucks every day if you want to save money in the new year. Here are seven different New Year's resolutions for you to consider, all of which will save you money in 2018.

title: The 11 Best Things to Buy Before (and Immediately After) Christmas
description: Black Friday makes November a prime time for deals, but December still has a lot to offer. We've scoured the DealNews archives from years gone by, to guide you in your quest for the best purchases for December.

title: Chase Freedom Unlimited® Card
Winc Wine Service
description: For new members only, Winc offers $25 off the cost of your first order. Plus, free shipping applies. Winc is a monthly wine delivery service. Just answer a few questions about your taste in wine, and you'll receive four bottles per month. (You can choose any combination of red or white wine.) Finally, there are no membership fees, and you can skip a month, or cancel anytime. Select states are excluded.
